rukus.text: ineziyami ketebedelu behwala be’alahi (menigedi layi) yetesededuti bek’iribitu ‘alemi melikamituni ageri (medinani) be’irigit’i inasefirachewaleni፡፡ yemech’ereshayitumi ‘alemi minida talak’i newi፡፡ (kehadiwochi) biyawik’u noro (beteketelwachewi neberi)፡፡
(inerisu) ineziya yetagesuti begetachewimi layi yemit’eguti nachewi፡፡
ke’anitemi befiti wede’inesu wehiyini (ra’iyini) yeminaweridilachewini sewochini iniji lelani alilakinimi፡፡ yematawik’umi bitihonu ye‘iwik’etini balebetochi t’eyik’u፡፡
begilits’i masirejawochina bemets’ahifiti (lakinachewi)፡፡ wede anitemi lesewochi wede’inesu yeteweredewini (fichi) litigelits’ilachewina yasitenetinumi zenidi k’uri’anini aweredini፡፡
ineziya met’ifowochini yedoletu alahi be’inesu midirini yemigelebit’ibachewi weyimi kemayawik’uti sifira k’it’ati yemimet’abachewi mehonuni ayiferumini
weyimi (kageri wede ageri) bemizawerubeti gize yemiyizachewi mehonuni (ayiferumini) inesumi ashenafiwochi ayidelumi፡፡
weyimi k’esi bek’esi bemagudeli layi yemiyizachewi mehonuni (ayiferumini) getachihumi be’irigit’i rihiruhi azanyi newi፡፡
wedeziya kemaninyawimi negeri alahi wede fet’erewi t’ilawochu inerisu yetewaredu sihonu le’alahi segajochi honewi kek’enyina kegirawochi wedemizaweruti alayumini
le’alahimi besemayati yalewi ketenik’esak’ashimi bemidiri yalewi hulu፣ mela’ikitimi yisegidalu፡፡ inerisumi ayikorumi፡፡
getachewini kebelayachewi sihoni yiferutali፡፡ yetazezutinimi hulu yiseralu፡፡
